members.member:
Ffs the specified a.
a. The b. The c. The d. The x. The s. The ac. FF, GG, HH, and II transformations for rounds 1, 2, 3, and 4. Rotation is separate from addition to prevent recomputation.

member.name: M:Octane.Xam.VideoPlayer.WP81.Cryptography.MD5.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Octane.Xam.VideoPlayer.WP81.Cryptography.MD5.Initialize
member.summary: MD5 initialization. Begins an MD5 operation, writing a new context.

member.name: M:Octane.Xam.VideoPlayer.WP81.Cryptography.MD5.HashCore(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: MD5 block update operation. Continues an MD5 message-digest operation, processing another message block, and updating the context.

member.name: M:Octane.Xam.VideoPlayer.WP81.Cryptography.MD5.HashFinal
member.summary: MD5 finalization. Ends an MD5 message-digest operation, writing the the message digest and zeroizing the context.

member.name: M:Octane.Xam.VideoPlayer.WP81.Cryptography.MD5.Transform(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: MD5 basic transformation. Transforms state based on 64 bytes block.

member.name: M:Octane.Xam.VideoPlayer.WP81.Cryptography.MD5.Encode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.UInt32[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes input (uint) into output (byte). Assumes len is multiple of 4.

member.name: M:Octane.Xam.VideoPlayer.WP81.Cryptography.MD5.Decode(System.UInt32[],System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes input (byte) into output (uint). Assumes len is a multiple of 4.

member.name: P:Octane.Xam.VideoPlayer.WP81.Cryptography.MD5.CanReuseTransform
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance can reuse transform.
member.value: true if this instance can reuse transform; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance can transform multiple blocks.
member.value: true if this instance can transform multiple blocks; otherwise, false.
